name: Play Dead - DEMO
description:
Very simple, kill zombies, special infected, collect stuff and get from point A to point B. It's not even close to being finished, so stick with me.

Here's a YouTube playlist where I'll be posting constant videos about recent updates:

https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLmcpFNKgpcdtjXt2rq2pPhN4sZDhbgokY&disable_polymer=true

Join the Discord server of Play Dead, let's chat:
